result.name: ukti-tax-arrangements-for-off-payroll-appointees
result.notes:
UKTI details of all individuals engaged off payroll.

The data shows: number of off-payroll engagements for those earning more than £220 per day and lasting more than 6 months duration, new engagements or those that reached 6 months duration, engagements of board members, and/or senior officials with significant financial responsibility during that period, number of engagements for whom assurance as to their tax obligations has been sought, number who have successfully provided assurance and action taken against those who have not successfully provided assurance.

Following the ‘Review of the tax arrangements of public sector appointees’, government departments were required to implement the recommendations. To find out more visit https://www.gov.uk/government/publications/review-of-the-tax-arrangements-of-public-sector-appointees

organization.name: uk-trade-and-investment
organization.title: UK Trade and Investment
organization.description:
UKTI works with UK based businesses to ensure their success in international markets through exports. We encourage and support overseas companies to look at the UK as the best place to set up or expand their business.

http://www.gov.uk/ukti

result.title: UKTI tax arrangements for off-payroll appointees
